column1: #text=Traveling by train can be very convenient and\/or relaxing .
#text=Some trains , like commuter trains , can get you into a city without having to rely on cars or walking .
#text=This is very quick , affordable , and convenient !
#text=You simply hop on the train at your stop and hop off when you need to .
#text=Most commuter trains offer passes that are a great discount for people who ride it often .
#text=Perhaps you do n't like to fly or do n't want to drive your car a long distance .
#text=If you ride a train , you can see the beautiful scenery as you travel but you are free to walk around , read , chat , or even grab a bite to eat !
#text=Some trains also have sleeper cars so travelers can be well-rested when they arrive at their destination .
#text=There are many conveniences to going on a train that make it a great option for getting from point A to point B !
